name: Outpatient Mental Health Service Clinic
description: The Foundation’s Outpatient Mental Health Program specializes in recovery-oriented treatment for people of all ages. and provides community-based outpatient support for: - Outpatient methadone maintenance - Jail methadone maintenance - Outpatient SUD (drug and/or alcohol use) counseling - Adult behavioral and mental health services - Youth behavioral and mental health services - Trauma and recovery school based counseling - Jelani family residential step down
